english.presentationTextFirstParagraph: I´m a design enthusiast in all of its shapes. I started with industrial design and 3D printing, but now, I’ve discovered my real desire: User experience and interface design.
english.presentationTextSecondParagraph: I consider myself to be a very open-minded and proactive person. Also, I enjoy public speaking and working in teams. After my bootcamp on UX and UI design and my experience in Habitant, I have the skills and knowledge to face my next challenge.
